attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!!!!!
attributes.review: This app runs horribly and took forever to download. Once I opened the app it required tons of sign-up information including name, email, phone number, and even ZIP Code, all information that is also required to make a TikTok account...... interesting right? This raises some concern as to what will happen to my data, I wanted to support our wonderful, intelligent, and SUPER supportive president but I donâ€™t want my info in the wrong hands. ALSO I just noticed that this app uses my LOCATION even when I am not actively using the app, terrifying and a HUGE invasion of privacy. So, I strongly feel that this app should be removed from the app store in order to prevent the spread of users personal data without their knowledge!!!!!

attributes.title: not good
attributes.review: i opened this app, and it asked me to give my personal phone number with the spray tanned weave wearing man in the background. i was so appalled, i walked straight into the amazon river where a group of piranhas started gnawing at me skin. once i finally made it out, the giant toucans took me to the serengeti plains in africa, where a lion chased me for 3 hours, but to lose him, i walked straight into hippo territory. i didnâ€™t even make it home in time for dinner! do not recommendğŸ˜¡!

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app took up so much storage on my phone that I had to delete everything else just for it to download (which took forever btw). My own father called me and I didnâ€™t know who it was because I had to delete all my contacts, pictures, apps, email - literally everything off my phone just for this one app. Even with everything else deleted, the app was so slow it took hours to load anything and kept crashing. Iâ€™m 99.99% sure it also gave my phone a bug because now I keep seeing outgoing calls I never made... Is the president trying to hack into our phones and personal information? Itâ€™s a good thing I deleted everything else!
